name: Discover Takenoko
description:
*This is not a full game*
Discover Takenoko is the promotional application for Takenoko, a family board game of gardening and panda mayhem for 2 to 4 players by designer Antoine Bauza, co-edited by Bombyx and Matagot.
The application is an introduction to the game setting and rules. It was intended to let people learn the rules without having to read the rulebook.

Have a look and if you like what you see you can purchase the physical board game online or in retail stores.
Takenoko won the first prize at Cannes' board games fair in France.
